'''''Millelith's Watch''''' is the [[soundtrack]] album for [[The Chasm (Subregion)|The Chasm]].

It features a total of 40 tracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team. The album is divided into three discs: ''Wrinkled Peaks'', ''Underground Adventures'', and ''Battles of the Chasm''.

The album was first announced on May 20, 2022, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 2.7]]. The tracklist was announced on June 19 and the album was later released on June 22.<ref>Bilibili: [https://t.bilibili.com/673334173613686792?spm_id_from=333.999.0.0 {{zh|《原神》层岩巨渊主题OST即将上线}}]</ref>
